info.title: Close a nested modal dialog in interaction mode

setupScript.name: openVerificationResultDialogAndFocusCloseButton
setupScript.description: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' dialog followed by the 'Verification Result' dialog, and sets focus on the 'Close' button inside the second dialog

user: With focus on the 'Close' button inside a modal dialog, close the dialog.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Close' button inside a modal dialog, close the dialog.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Role of the focused element ('button') is conveyed
Name of the focused element ('Verify Address') is conveyed
